TEXT.TITLE: CENTURY TELEPHONE <CTL> TO SELL PROPERTIES
TEXT.BODY: Century Telephone Enterprises Inc said it has accepted an offer to sell its cable television properties in Michigan, Tennessee, Florida, Arkansas and Louisiana for a "substantial" gain. The company said details were not disclosed. Reuter
